body:
Features and Enhancements

Data Vintage
  • Added Site ID and Product ID to network lists.
  • Product ID will appear automatically. Site ID will appear as projects are refreshed.
Password reset
  • Added url to password reset email if the Change my password link does not work.

Issues Fixed

Mapping U.S. territories
  • Enhanced maps to include U.S. Territories
    • New map images for U.S. territories (America Somoa, Guam, Puerto Rico, US Virgin Islands and Northern Mariana Islands) have been added to allow map views of providers in those geographies.
